statements: SELECT * FROM crop_data
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data WHERE soil_quality > 5
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, weather_conditions FROM crop_data WHERE yield >= 1000
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data ORDER BY yield DESC
SELECT AVG(yield) as average_yield, MAX(yield) as max_yield, MIN(yield) as min_yield FROM crop_data
SELECT * FROM crop_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data WHERE soil_quality > 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield, soil_quality FROM crop_data WHERE yield >= 1000 AND weather_conditions LIKE '%sunny%';
SELECT crop_name, soil_quality FROM crop_data WHERE weather_conditions = 'rainy' ORDER BY soil_quality DESC;
SELECT crop_name, weather_conditions FROM crop_data WHERE yield BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, season FROM crop_yield WHERE season = 'Summer' AND location = 'Texas';
SELECT * FROM soil_quality WHERE pH_level > 6.5;
SELECT soil_type, moisture_level FROM soil_quality ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND season = 'Summer';
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE location = 'Farm B' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, location, season FROM crop_yield WHERE location = 'Farm C' AND yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY season ASC;
SELECT soil_type, pH_level, moisture_level FROM soil_quality WHERE fertility_rating = 'High' ORDER BY pH_level DESC, moisture_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield WHERE season IN ('Spring', 'Fall') AND location IN ('Farm D', 'Farm E') ORDER BY crop_name ASC, yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields;
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_conditions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_quality WHERE fertility_level > 2;
SELECT soil_type, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM soil_quality GROUP BY soil_type;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 50 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT soil_type, fertility_level FROM soil_quality WHERE soil_id > 5 ORDER BY soil_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 10;
SELECT crop_name, soil_type, temperature FROM crop_yields JOIN soil_quality ON crop_id = soil_id WHERE fertility_level > 2 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, date FROM crop_yields JOIN weather_conditions ON crop_id = weather_id WHERE yield_amount > 100 AND temperature < 30 AND precipitation > 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yields;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level FROM soil_quality ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT research_notes FROM research_data WHERE soil_id = 1002 AND weather_id = 2004;
SELECT * FROM crop_yields WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields ORDER BY yield_amount ASC
SELECT crop_name, year FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 10000
SELECT soil_type, pH_level FROM soil_quality ORDER BY pH_level DESC
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT location, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT site_id, location, researcher_id FROM research_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_id, location, researcher_id FROM research_sites WHERE location LIKE '%field%' AND researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_yields WHERE crop_id = 1 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC, date ASC
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM weather_conditions GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25
SELECT site_id, location FROM research_sites JOIN researchers ON research_sites.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id WHERE research_area = 'Agricultural Science'
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(site_id) AS num_sites FROM research_sites GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY num_sites DESC
SELECT crop_id, MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM crop_yields WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
